message.content:
{
  "derived_taxonomy": {
    "Platform content moderation & removal": [
      "Content takedowns and removals",
      "Account, bot and creator bans",
      "Content labeling, disclaimers and 'no AI' tags",
      "Third-party fact-checking and verification partnerships",
      "Proactive and reactive moderation workflows"
    ],
    "Model & product safety features": [
      "Prompt filtering and automated guardrails",
      "Safer-model routing and redirection for sensitive queries",
      "Parental controls and age-based experience restrictions",
      "User-facing behavioral nudges (break reminders, discourage overreliance)",
      "Likeness, voice and image usage controls (opt-in/consent mechanisms)"
    ],
    "Crisis support & mental health mitigations": [
      "Hotline referrals and crisis-resource signposting",
      "Distress detection and conversational de-escalation",
      "Sensitive-response protocols and escalation to humans",
      "Urgent safety reviews and incident triage"
    ],
    "Transparency, disclosure & openness": [
      "Algorithm and model open-sourcing / code publication",
      "System cards, model cards and training disclosures",
      "AI provenance metadata and visible/invisible watermarking",
      "AI-generation attribution and credit labels",
      "Crawl control and robots.txt-based site owner controls"
    ],
    "Investigations, audits & reviews": [
      "Internal incident investigations and root-cause analysis",
      "External audits and reverse-audits",
      "Regulatory probes and government inquiries",
      "Third-party expert reviews and shared forensic analysis"
    ],
    "Legal responses, lawsuits & regulatory orders": [
      "Lawsuits filed against or by AI companies",
      "Settlements, class-action resolutions and consent decrees",
      "Regulatory enforcement actions, fines and official sanctions",
      "Court orders, access bans and judicial injunctions"
    ],
    "Remediation, compensation & customer remedies": [
      "Refunds, credits and reimbursements to affected users",
      "Account corrections, removals and reinstatements",
      "Compensation payouts, settlements and statutory damages"
    ],
    "Policy changes & content rules": [
      "Bans on specific content types or use-cases (deepfakes, sexual content, etc.)",
      "Updates to terms of service and platform enforcement rules",
      "Restrictions on model outputs or disallowed categories"
    ],
    "Collaboration with experts, stakeholders & industry": [
      "Engagement with mental health professionals and clinicians",
      "Academic and researcher partnerships for labeling and benchmarking",
      "Industry negotiations and collective bargaining with creators/unions",
      "Partnerships with publishers, fact-checkers and verification organisations"
    ],
    "Detection, monitoring & defensive tooling": [
      "AI-generated content detection tools (audio, image, music detectors)",
      "Watermark detectors and SynthID-style verification tools",
      "Active monitoring, logging and anomaly detection",
      "Bug bounty programs and coordinated vulnerability disclosure"
    ],
    "Security & vulnerability remediation": [
      "Patching, software updates and product recalls",
      "Database exposure response and access shutdowns",
      "Sandboxing, access controls and credential hardening",
      "Account suspensions and takedowns for security incidents"
    ],
    "Operational controls & process changes": [
      "Human-in-the-loop and mandatory human review backstops",
      "Staffing changes, new trust & safety hires and governance updates",
      "Feature rollbacks, opt-in/opt-out changes and staged launches",
      "Dedicated 24/7 monitoring and incident response teams"
    ],
    "Content provenance & intellectual property (IP) responses": [
      "Copyright takedowns, cease-and-desist actions and removals",
      "Licensing demands, proposed compensation frameworks and licensing models",
      "Platform removal or demotion of infringing AI-generated content",
      "Publisher and rights-holder demands for disclosure of training sources"
    ],
    "Education, warnings & user guidance": [
      "Public warnings and advisories about scams and deepfakes",
      "Advice to users to verify AI outputs and triangulate sources",
      "Published tips, guides and crisis-support contacts for the public",
      "Retraining and awareness programs for staff and contractors"
    ],
    "Enforcement & law enforcement cooperation": [
      "Reporting to and cooperation with police and investigators",
      "Arrests, prosecutions, extraditions and criminal charges",
      "Law-enforcement-led takedowns, seizures and asset forfeiture",
      "Preservation of evidence and legal preservation requests"
    ]
  }
}

{

  }
}

{
  "derived_taxonomy": {
    "Content Removal & Enforcement Actions": [
